channel.title: Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
channel.description: I'm using Exion server and client and this error keeps on coming up :Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36. Whenever that shows up, my character is able to move only a few steps before the whole thing shuts down on me. What can I do about this problem? I'm new to the Runescape Private Server stuff lol.

item.title: Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
item.dc:creator: @Lexaeus97 Lexaeus97
item.description:
@Lexaeus97 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:370968”]What OS are you on?

It could be a compatibility issue which happens with a lot of clients that are in batch form.

It mainly happens in Windows 7, But I think it also happens in vista sometimes,

Anyways if that is the case, then you will need to download a converter which will convert it from a batch file to an executable form.[/quote]

I’m using Windows 7 x64

Read full topic

item.title: Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

This has got nothing to do with which operating systems you’re running the client on. A T1 error happens when there is an unknown packet type.

The format of a T1 error is as follows:
T1 - , , ,

Read full topic

item.title: Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

What OS are you on?

It could be a compatibility issue which happens with a lot of clients that are in batch form.

It mainly happens in Windows 7, But I think it also happens in vista sometimes,

Anyways if that is the case, then you will need to download a converter which will convert it from a batch file to an executable form.

Read full topic
